name: Realistic Heron Simulator
description:
i am a heron. i haev a long neck and i pick fish out of the water w/ my beak. if you dont repost this game on 10 other pages i will fly into your kitchen tonight and make a mess of your pots and pans.

Tom Scott's idea: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-MyrZF5QGVo
